ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: Yes, good exposure to various important public topics
If you want to do research in Public Finance, take this course!
If you are interested in public finance, you should take this course.
It is nice to expose yourself to different empirical approaches
If you are interested in applied microeconomics and in learning reduced form models, then this is a good course.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: I did not know much about health care before taking this course, and I the readings and lectures gave me a few research ideas.
Prof. Shapiro was always mindful about teaching us what is important in research. So very helpful.
